prompts.prompt: Would you prefer to cut back on dining out, cancel some subscriptions, or reduce clothing purchases to save $1,000 this year?
Will you switch to public transportation, reduce energy consumption, or take fewer vacations to save $1,500 this year?
Will you cancel your gym membership, cook more meals at home, or reduce online shopping to save $2,000 this year?
Will you downsize your car, reduce entertainment expenses, or cut back on personal care services to save $2,500 this year?

options.name: Cut Back on Personal Care Services

prompts.prompt: Will you implement a strict budget, limit luxury purchases, or refinance loans to save $3,000 this year?
Will you start a side hustle, cut back on utility bills, or eliminate non-essential travel to save $3,500 this year?
Will you adopt a minimalist lifestyle, bulk buy groceries, or switch to a cheaper phone plan to save $4,000 this year?

options.name: Switch to a Cheaper Phone Plan

prompts.prompt: Will you share living expenses with a roommate, grow your own food, or cancel premium services to save $4,500 this year?

options.name: Share Living Expenses with a Roommate

prompts.prompt: Will you reduce healthcare expenses, join a barter community, or cut back on holiday spending to save $5,000 this year?
Will you downsize your living space, automate savings, or participate in a local co-op to save $5,500 this year?
